questions.question: At which vertebral level is the transpyloric plane located?
questions.explanation: The transpyloric plane passes through the pylorus of the stomach and is at the level of L1 vertebra.

questions.question: Which structure forms the posterior boundary of the epiploic foramen (of Winslow)?
questions.explanation: The epiploic foramen is bounded anteriorly by the hepatoduodenal ligament and posteriorly by the inferior vena cava.
hints: Think about boundaries of lesser sac

metadata.description: Abdominal wall, peritoneal cavity, gastrointestinal organs, and retroperitoneum
